Missing the War Ben Folds Five

Intro:

Verse 2: Repeat chords

Now nothing’s adding up. And nothing’s making sense. She’s sleeping like a baby. She doesn’t know he wasn’t meant for this.

Chorus:

Amaj7 Amin C in bass I’ m missing the war. (ba ba ba ba) Amin C in bass Emaj7 I’m m iss ing the war. (ba ba ba ba) Emaj7 All n ight. C# F# Missing the war. (ba ba ba ba) F# M issing the war Repeat intro:

Verse 3: Repeat verse chords

He drove home again. Pissed and beaten. It’s really no big deal It happens all the time It’s no big deal.

Chorus.
